reviews.customers_say: Customers find these pajamas sexy and comfortable, describing them as easy on the skin and feeling like butter on the skin. The material quality receives positive feedback, with one customer noting it's not see-through, and they appreciate the nice color options. While some customers find the sizing true to size, others report that the bottoms are much smaller than expected.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, Silky, and Suddenly I’m Doing the Dishes More Often!
items.body: I bought these silk satin backless pajamas as a surprise gift for my wife, and they were a huge hit! The material is super soft and has that smooth, luxurious feel you’d expect from real satin. She says they’re comfortable, lightweight, and perfect for warm nights. From my perspective — they look amazing. The fit is elegant but flattering, and she loves how it makes her feel dressed up even when just lounging around. The quality is great for the price, and the color looks exactly like the photos. If you’re thinking about getting these as a gift, do it. Your partner will feel great wearing them — and you’ll definitely enjoy seeing them too! Read more
items.author: shaun

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Jaw dropping sexy. Silky smooth, the color was perfect
items.body: I purchased this for my wife for her birthday. We had a little difficulty figuring out the top, but that made it fun. After we figured it out and adjusted the straps she modeled it for me. Well it felt like it was my birthday!!! The top fits her great but in hindsight I should of got the extra small. The material is very silky and soft. A bit disappointed that it is dry cleaning only. We will try hand wash and hang dry. Regardless f it gets ruined cleaning it, seeing her in it and the fun we then had was well worth the cost!!!! So very sexy. I purhased the dark purple one, I forget what color it was listed as but dark purples are my favorites, this color is amazing I'd definitely recommend this item and I might just be buying another one and try the extra small. Read more
items.author: Rich Rego

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ 5/5 – Perfect Fit & Luxurious Feel
items.body: These silk pajamas are absolutely perfect! The fit was exactly as described, which is always a relief when ordering online. They look super cute and feel so comfortable – I could wear them all day. What I love most is that they manage to be sexy and comfy at the same time, which is a hard balance to strike. The fabric feels soft and smooth against the skin, and the quality is impressive for the price. If you’re looking for pajamas that feel luxurious without breaking the bank, I’d definitely recommend these. Read more
items.author: Avid Shopper

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars More modest version of sexy
items.body: Its comfortable im told by my wife and i really like seeing her in it. It fits true to size. If you are somewhere cold better crank up the heat or get a rob to go with. It looks great but probably wont hold up for long id still say its a buy. Read more
items.author: Jack1911

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love love love it!!
items.body: Boy oh boy ohhh boyyyy!! I wore this when I had company over last week and let me tell you!! It did not stay on long!!!! This soft and silky set is perfect for when you want to be comfortable and SEXY without appearing to try (if that makes sense) Read more
items.author: Stephanie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sexy bed time
items.body: I bought for my wife, fit very well minor adjustments, comfortable and loose for bedtime or just for being comfortable around the house. Nice and soft silk material don’t feel heavy. Read more
items.author: joel

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars What strap goes where?
items.body: It took me a long time to figure out how to put it on. There’s a lot of straps if it takes me 15 minutes put on it’s not worth it cause it’s probably coming right back off. I love the color and the material was great. Read more
items.author: MeWee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Do it!!
items.body: Such a cute set! I just went back and bought a 2nd pair in a different pattern bc this set is adorable and so comfy! Read more
items.author: Jessie

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Blue Leaf Pinted, Wine Red Flowers, Dark Blue Flowers, Champagne Love Teddy, Red Heart, Pumpkin, Red Flowers, Christmas-red-gingerbread, Black, Black Flowers, Navy Blue Flowers, Black Ghost, Brown Leopard, Rose Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
